EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI Coolers! We are excited to hear from you. Here at YETI, giving back to the communities we serve is an important part of who we are as a company. With that adventure in mind, we have created a Fundraising Program built for the wild, blazing that bold venturesome trail of fundraising! Our program exists to serve all qualified nonprofit organizations by providing a genuine unmatched customer experience. We will strive to create a YETI presence with our brand and products, maximizing fundraising revenue for the nonprofit organizations we support. We look forward to working with you to make your event rugged, tough and successful the YETI way! You can refer to our website at https://yeti.formstack.com/forms/fundraising to start your application process.
We are excited to have the opportunity to work with you and we look forward to hearing from you!
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname}
The YETI Outfitters
512.394.9384
